Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Body > Cleansers > Body Washes
products.description: A body wash that gives you lotion-soft feeling skin? Yep, you read that right. Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash is a new type of body care that does what it says. It delivers such deep moisture that your skin will feel lotion-soft long after you leave the shower. Think of it as a shortcut to lotion-soft skin that takes no shortcuts on skin-loving, hydrating ingredients. Let’s get deep to explain. Millions of 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture droplets with skin-natural nourishers and plant-based moisturizers absorb deeply and work with your skin’s natural renewal process to help retain and boost moisture for nourished, soft and healthy-looking skin. You can count on them to deliver a deep level of moisture that starts in the shower and lasts all day. We’re talking peak moisturization. Like iconic level moisture. Up there with Dove's iconic scent of care with gentle, fresh flowers, nourishing soft vanilla, and creamy, milky musks. But don’t take our word for it, try it for yourself. products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Body Sprays
products.description: Finish off your self-care routine with Tree Hut's Aurora Nights Fragrance Mist! Reveal youthful skin with the indulgent scent of Aurora Nights, a cozy scent with notes of warm pistachio and toasted marshmallow. The alcohol-free formula helps skin feel hydrated and conditioned with a long-lasting scent! A perfect gift for women of all ages, Tree Hut Fragrance Mists are paraben free, vegan, sulfate-free, do not contain formaldehyde donors. Lightly mist over your skin and shower for a soothing self-care routine and an indulgent at-home spa experience. Tree Hut believes that everyone deserves to take time in their day to feel good, even if it's just in the shower or bath. From our Shea Sugar Scrubs and Body Lotions to our Fragrance Mists and Body Washes, we craft delicious and delightful beauty products with exceptional quality.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: Infused with glycerin, a natural humectant known to help draw moisture into the skin and keep it feeling soft and refreshed
GENTLE & ALCOHOL-FREE: Helps prevent dryness commonly caused by traditional mists; Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin
CUSTOM SCENT WARDROBE: Spritz on any time of day for a refreshed feel or layer on with your favorite Tree Hut scents for a customized scent wardrobe

products.product_name: Afnan 9 PM For Men Eau De Parfum, 3.4 Fl. Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Men's > Eau de Parfum
products.description: A bold and provocative fragrance that exudes masculinity and sensuality. It opens with a burst of freshness, featuring top notes of bergamot and pear, which provide a crisp and invigorating introduction. As the scent develops, it reveals its heart notes of mint, lavender, and cinnamon, adding depth and complexity to the composition. Overall, 9PM Black is a fragrance that is both powerful and refined, making it perfect for the modern man who wants to make a bold statement. Its distinctive blend of fresh and spicy notes ensures that it stands out from the crowd, making it a timeless classic in the world of men's fragrances.
features: A provocative fragrance that exudes confidence, sensuality, and sophistication.
Crisp top notes of bergamot, lavandin, cinnamon, and apple create an invigorating introduction.
Middle notes of muguet and orange blossom add depth and elegance to the composition.
A blend of patchouli, amber, vanilla, and tonka bean provides a refined and lasting finish.
A timeless scent ideal for making a bold and unforgettable impression.

products.description:
PURE FRAGRANCE AMBERY VANILLA : Experience the captivating blend of Mandarin, Pear, Pink Pepper, and Licorice that awakens your senses. Discover the heart of the fragrance with Jasmine and Orange Blossom. Finally indulge in the rich aromas of Cedarwood, Patchouli, Vanilla, and Coffee !

PERFUME FOR ALL : We aim to make high-quality eau de toilette accessible to everyone, not just the elite few. Our goal is to promote equality by providing premium fragrances at affordable prices.
VEGAN AND PARABEN FREE : Our perfume follow cosmetic safety recommendations when formulating our products, sustainable, and sourced from the highest quality ingredients. Phthalate-free. Our vegan and eco-friendly fragrance is 100% non-toxic and cruelty-free so you can indulge guilt-free.

products.product_name: Beetles 2 Pcs 15ml No Wipe Gel Top Coat and Base Coat Set - Shine Finish and Long Lasting Soak Off LED Nail Lamp Gel Base Top Coat Finish Nail Art Design Manicure Gifts for Women
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Nail Art & Polish > Base & Top Coats > Combination Base & Top Coats
products.description:
Beetles No Wipe Top Coat and Base Coat: Enjoy long-lasting wear for over 28 days with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat prevents nicks, chips, and smudges. Tip: The base coat is designed to remain sticky, providing a solid foundation for the next coat of polish. (Note: The base gel should not be used as glue.)
High-Quality and Protective: Beetles Glossy No Wipe Top Coat and base, with proper application, can last with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat avoids nicks, chips, or smudges. Ideal Mother's Day gifts for her. Tips: Avoid touching your nails after curing the top coat for 2 minutes to enhance the shine.
Easy Application and Good Tenacity:If you have sensitive skin, we recommend using this product in conjunction with Liquid Peel off Latex Tape. This tape minimizes direct skin contact with the gel, reducing the chance of allergic reactions. It also helps in achieving more precise nail art. Please note that Liquid Peel off Latex Tape is not included with this product and must be purchased separately.
Reminder: In low temperatures, the base coat may become clumpy or thick, which can cause the brush to break off inside the bottle. If this happens, please contact us for satisfactory after-sales service. Tip: There's no need to wipe off the tacky residue of the base coat, as it helps the color coat adhere longer to your nails.If you feel a burning sensation during curing, it is recommended to remove your hand from the lamp. Resume curing once the sensation returns to normal.
Tips for preventing nail surface peeling off:(1) Polishing of the nail surface: Polish the front, side and trailing edge of the nail until there are no reflective spots on the nail surface(2) Nail surface cleaning: It is recommended to use Nail dehydrator to remove oil and moisture from the nail surface(3)Lighting time: It is recommended that the lighting time for base Coat, Color Gel and Top Coat at least 60 seconds.

This anti-dandruff shampoo and clarifying shampoo for build-up starts working after just one use to help remove crusty build-up and prevent flakes. The fragrance-free formula is free of added color and preservatives and features a conditioning base to leave hair feeling soft. Designed for adults seeking relief from dry, itchy, flaky scalps, this dermatologist recommended seborrheic dermatitis and psoriasis shampoo continues to work for hours after rinsing. Use as a dry scalp shampoo, dandruff treatment, or for scalp build-up control as part of your regular hair care routine. Neutrogena T/Sal is formulated to address persistent scalp issues and is suitable for those needing a reliable solution for dry scalp treatment, flakes shampoo, and clarifying shampoo for build-up. With regular use, this anti-dandruff shampoo helps maintain a cleaner, healthier scalp environment and leaves hair feeling refreshed. Add Neutrogena T/Sal to your scalp care routine today for effective, long-lasting relief and visible results.
features: Dandruff shampoo with maximum strength: 3% salicylic acid formula targets stubborn flakes and scalp build-up; prevents dandruff, scalp psoriasis and seborrheic dermatitis for visible results after just one use

Seborrheic dermatitis shampoo relief: clears crusty build-up and soothes itching, flaking and irritation; therapeutic action continues for hours after rinsing, providing long-lasting comfort for dry, itchy, flaky scalps

Clarifying shampoo for build-up: removes scalp residue and helps prevent future flakes; anti-dandruff formula is free of added color, preservatives and fragrance for a gentle, effective cleanse every wash

Psoriasis shampoo for multi-condition care: treats symptoms of dandruff, scalp psoriasis and seborrheic dermatitis in one formula; dermatologist recommended for targeted relief and scalp health support
Dry scalp shampoo and anti-dandruff care: conditioning liquid formula hydrates and relieves dry, itchy scalp; delivers maximum strength flake control and scalp build-up removal

products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Designed for sensitive skin and gentle on the delicate eye area, these face cleansing wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.

This foundation gives you instant elegance with full coverage, a classic matte finish that's never cakey, and a long-wear formula that doesn't fade. LIGHT: Light beige with warm yellow undertones
ANTI-AGING INGREDIENTS: With antioxidant-rich Jojoba Seed Oil that softens and soothes skin, Centella Asiatica Extract that hydrates and mitigates sun damage, and anti-aging Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, there's plenty to love about how this foundation looks and feels. For more serious coverage, apply it wet with the white side of the sponge. Dampen the sponge, dab the powder and pat onto face then blend outward and upward until fully blended.

products.product_name: Boka Fluoride Free Toothpaste, Nano Hydroxyapatite Toothpaste, Appropriate for Sensitive Teeth, for Adult, Kids Oral Care - Whitening* Refresh Mint, 4 Fl Oz 1Pk US Manufactured
products.breadcrumb: Health & Household > Oral Care > Toothpaste
products.description:
ENAMEL CARE: Our proprietary and innovative formula includes Nano-hydroxyapatite (n-Ha) - a biometric mineral form of the same ingredient that naturally makes up 97% of your teeth material and 70% of your dentin. n-Ha has been the subject of significant research for decades with a wide variety of potential benefits across dentistry and oral care.
BIOCOMPATIBLE: Free from Fluoride, Sulfates, Parabens & Artificial Flavors & Colors - we meticulously crafted our product to be biocompatible, ensuring it’s safe for daily use and non-toxic when used as directed. A perfect way to take your oral hygiene routine to the next level!
APPROPRIATE FOR SENSITIVE TEETH: Gentle yet effective, it provides a soothing and refreshing experience for the whole family. Embrace an oral care routine designed for a luxurious experience.
MINTY FRESH: We complemented n-HA with our soothing aloe vera, bacteria fighting xylitol, antioxidant-rich green tea, and refreshing mint, to give this paste a refreshing and invigorating flavor profile.
*WHITENING: With Regular brushing, helps remove surface stains.

products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Each twin pack includes two 25-count packs (50 wipes total) for daily convenience at home or on the go. These makeup remover wipes feature a triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and conditioned with no heavy residue and no need to rinse. Designed for sensitive skin and gentle on the delicate eye area, these face cleansing wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.

products.description:
EVEN OUT UNEVEN SKIN TONE — Unlock the power of a transparent collagen jelly cream designed to specifically target and target uneven skin tone. Reveal a more harmonious, luminous complexion for a naturally smooth and radiant look.
PRODUCT BENEFITS — Quickly reveals a more radiant, refreshed complexion with the ‘Korean Glass Glow’ effect post-application. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, silicone-free, maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.69–7.69, and is free from artificial color.

products.product_name: medicube PDRN Pink Peptide Serum with Salmon DNA | Pink Glow Serum with Peptides & Niacinamide for Hydration & Firm-Looking Skin | Uneven Tone Care | Korean Skincare, 1.01 fl. Oz

products.description:
KOREAN GLASS GLOW SKIN: This pink glow serum targets dull skin and boosts elasticity, helping to prevent future breakouts while enhancing the skin's glow and resilience.
SALMON DNA PDRN: Salmon DNA PDRN is a form of DNA extracted from salmon. It stimulates skin renewal and repair, giving your skin a clearer, more luminous complexion. It promotes a more even skin tone and a natural glow by improving skin health.
KEY INGREDIENTS: Containing Salmon DNA PDRN, five types of peptide complex, niacinamide, adenosine, and Ocimum Sanctum (Holy Basil) leaf extract, this formula provides effective care for uneven skin tone and elasticity.

products.description: A body wash that gives you lotion-soft feeling skin? Yep, you read that right. Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash is a new type of body care that does what it says. It delivers such deep moisture that your skin will feel lotion-soft long after you leave the shower. Think of it as a shortcut to lotion-soft skin that takes no shortcuts on skin-loving, hydrating ingredients. Let’s get deep to explain. Millions of 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture droplets with skin-natural nourishers and plant-based moisturizers absorb deeply and work with your skin’s natural renewal process to help retain and boost moisture for nourished, soft and healthy-looking skin. You can count on them to deliver a deep level of moisture that starts in the shower and lasts all day. We’re talking peak moisturization. Like iconic level moisture. Up there with Dove's iconic scent of care with gentle, fresh flowers, nourishing soft vanilla, and creamy, milky musks. But don’t take our word for it, try it for yourself. To use this rich, creamy body wash, squeeze into palms or loofah, massage onto skin, rinse, and step out of the shower feeling moisturized all over. And take a minute to touch that incredibly soft skin. Who else would you trust, but the No.1 dermatologist-recommended brand (us) to deliver a long-lasting, nourishing body wash? Plus it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free and packaged in a 100% recyclable bottle. Our Deep Moisture Body Wash is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world.
features: Allure Best of Beauty winning product 2023, 2024, 2025. SMOOTHER SKIN IN JUST ONE WASH: Our long-lasting moisturizing body wash formula, with millions of MicroMoisture droplets, leaves skin feeling seriously soft and nourished.
24HR RENEWING MICROMOISTURE: Get lotion-soft skin with Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash that gently cleans and deeply moisturizes, leaving skin nourished and healthy-looking for 24 hours.
PLANT-BASED MOISTURIZERS: Treat your microbiome (aka skin’s living protective layer) with naturally derived cleansers and skin-natural nutrients that gently nourish for seriously moisturized skin.
NOURISHES THE DRIEST SKIN: The ultimate thirst trap for dry skin with a formula that actively regenerates skin’s natural moisture for instant and all-day hydration.

THOUGHTFULLY MADE: Our body wash is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world. Plus, it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free and packaged in 100% recycled bottles, so you can feel good about choosing Dove.

products.product_name: FLYHIT Large Towel Warmer for Bathroom - Heated Towel Warmers Bucket, Wood Handle, Auto Shut Off, Fits Up to Two 40"X70" Oversized Towels, Bathrobes, Blankets, for Mother's Gifts, White
products.breadcrumb: Home & Kitchen > Bath > Bathroom Accessories > Towel Warmers
products.description:
Generous Capacity Warmer: This spacious bathroom essential can easily accommodate two extra-large 40" x 70" bath towels, along with robes, blankets, pajamas, and more. Alternatively, it can hold around 5 medium-sized bath towels. With dimensions of 11.53" in length, 11.53" in width, and 19" in height, it boasts a total capacity of 20 liters, making it ideal for family use. Elevate your home with a spa-like touch.You can safely heat cotton materials, but please refrain from heating chemical fiber towels or clothing, as well as any materials that are not heat-resistant.Do not use it to dry wet towels or other damp items.
Experience Swift Heating: With a simple process, just place your towels within the warmer, shut the lid, and press the WORK button. The 450W heating element ensures even warming, bringing your towels to a cozy temperature within 25 minutes. Use the TIMER button to choose a preservation time between 1 to 4 hours, guaranteeing a supply of warm towels whenever desired. Immerse yourself in a spa-like oasis right in your own bathroom.Upon startup, the built-in timer defaults to 30 minutes. If you wish to keep it on for 30 minutes, there is no need for set. The indicator light will automatically illuminate once the 30-minute insulation mode is activated.
Safety at the Core: Safety is paramount, which is why our ETL-certified towel warmer features a wooden lid and a fire-resistant, eco-friendly plastic exterior that poses no allergenic risks to the body. The triple-layer temperature control mechanism automatically shuts off the heater if the internal bucket temperature becomes too high, effectively preventing any potential overheating issues. Enjoy the warmth indoors with complete peace of mind, relishing in your spa-inspired experience.Please take note of the bucket body indicator: It is unsafe to touch the interior of the device when the hot surface indicator light is on.
A Remarkable Gift: This versatile towel warmer serves as the ultimate accessory for various settings, including homes, pools, showers, hotels, salons, spas, massages, baby care, and elderly care. Once you've indulged in the luxury of warm towels, you'll be treated to a delightful surprise after every bath. It's a thoughtful and considerate gift choice for housewarmings, weddings, showers, birthdays, anniversaries, and countless other occasions.
Our After Sale Service: FLYHIT After Sale Service: Our friendly and reliable customer service will respond to you within 24 hours. You can purchase with confidence, with our 30-day return and 12-month replacement.

products.product_name: Pure Daily Care NuDerma Handheld Skin Therapy Wand Machine w/Neon – Anti-Aging - Skin Tightening - Wrinkle Reducing - Dark Circles – Clarifying - Hair & Scalp Stimulator
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Salon & Spa Equipment > High Frequency Machines
products.description:
Complete Skin Care System - Winner of Cosmopolitan 2023 "Holy Grail" Awards. Adenosine Triphosphate (ATP) is the universal currency for energy in all cells of the body. As we age, ATP production slows, leading to the outward signs of aging. Sagging skin, hair loss and age spots are among the hallmark signs of decreased cell activity. The NuDerma Skin Wand amplifies cell turnover by supercharging ATP synthesis to slow, halt and ultimately reverse the aging process leading to firmer younger skin.
Anti-Aging Neon Applicators – The four included Neon powered applicators deliver targeted skin boosting benefits, no matter your skin type. NuDerma sessions energize and oxygenate the skin to increase cellular activity - It’s like a workout for your skin. With regular use you’ll notice the reduced appearance of fine lines and wrinkles over time. Please discontinue use if you experience any skin sensitivity or irritation.
A Smoother Brighter Complexion – NuDerma application fights the underlying causes of bumpy skin at the source. Sub-dermal issues cause skin irregularities. Nuderma tames bumps to create a smoother, clearer-looking complexion that glows after just a single session.
Better Absorption of Your Beauty Serums and Creams – Your preferred beauty creams and serums are expensive. NuDerma ensures that you are getting their maximum effects by improving your skins receptiveness to absorption. Use your preferred serums or creams immediately after NuDerma Sessions to ensure maximum absorption into the deeper layers of your skin; boosting their effects by up to 5x.
What's in the Box – 1 NuDerma Device, Neon powered mushroom wand, Neon powered spot wand, Neon powered comb wand, neon powered tongue wand, quick-start treatment guides, instruction and support contact manual.

This allows you to focus on the nail design without worrying about the risk of shaking or the nail plate falling off the finger deck. This will give you access to the battery tray. Replace bad battery and simply slide trimmer back into the metal sleeve. To remove the trimmer head pinch the head between your index finger and thumb then turn counterclockwise a quarter turn and lift away from the trimmer body. To replace the head, align the notches on the head with the channel on the trimmer body, press down and turn a quarter turn clockwise until it locks into place. products.description: Say "goodbye" to stubble, irritation, nicks, and cuts and say "hello" to beautiful, hydrated skin with Tree Hut Bare Vanilla Moisturizing Shave Oil. Formulated with Shea Butter, Vanilla, Colloidal Gold, and a blend of four natural oils, this shaving oil soothes skin and helps prevent irritation, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and hydrated. The unique gel-to-oil formula provides a smooth glide and ample hydration, both during shaving and after rinsing off. Plus, it smells like warm, creamy vanilla with notes of warm sandalwood and coconut cream, adding a touch of indulgence to your bath and beauty rituals. Whether it's a thoughtful present for your wife, mother, or any special woman in your life, Tree Hut Bare Shave Oil is ideal for birthdays, holidays, and more. Tree Hut Moisturizing Shave Oils are alcohol-free, formaldehyde-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and vegan for a pampering experience she'll love. Apply to wet skin, shave, and rinse or wipe off for a silky-smooth finish. For an even closer shave, use Tree Hut Shea Sugar Scrub as an exfoliator prior to use!

products.product_name: Hair Remover, Veet Gel Hair Removal Cream Sensitive, 13.5 Ounce, Sensitive formula with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E (pack of 1)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Women's > Depilatories
products.description: Now live more spontaneous moments with Veet Hair Remover Cream that removes even stubborn hair in just few minutes. Enriched with active ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this hair removal cream for women moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling smooth and soft. The sensitive hair removal cream comes with delightful fragrance of Vanilla and Passion Fruit for a satisfying and breathtaking experience. This aloe vera hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and can be used for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal. The results of Veet may last up to twice as long as shaving. It comes in a pump bottle with a spatula for easy dispensing, applying and removal. Suitable for: Creams can be used by everyone, including pregnant women. Teenagers under 16 are supposed to be supervised by an adult when using any depilatory method. Caution: Before every use, test your skin by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area as skin is a sensitive part of the body. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. Veet cream is not suitable for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples. Read pack for full instructions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.

Burt's Bees Beeswax Lip Balm instantly softens and hydrates your lips to help prevent dryness, cracking or chapping. Infused with responsibly sourced beeswax and vitamin E to richly moisturize and soothe lips, this lip balm will make your lips juicy, happy and healthy. A matte finish keeps your lips their natural color, while the tint-free tube of lip moisturizer glides on smoothly to pamper dry lips while keeping them protected and hydrated. A final hint of peppermint oil provides that one-of-a-kind refreshing tingle. Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this flavored lip balm is 100% natural origin to rejuvenate and beautify chapped lips with clean ingredients. You can conveniently tuck a tube of this moisturizing lip balm into your pocket or purse to keep natural, nurturing lip care at your fingertips. Playing by natures rules since 1984, Burts Bees uses ingredients from nature to nourish and revitalize your skin and lips, making products that have become a staple of your household. Burts Bees is the No. 1 dermatologist-recommended natural skin care brand (1). (1) Based on a September 2021 NielsenIQ national survey of U.S. Dermatologists.
By Burt's Bees

products.description: Q-tips cotton swabs are the Ultimate Home and Beauty Tool. With the softest cotton at the tip from the end of the stick to the top of the swab and a gently flexible stick, Q-tips cotton swabs are perfect for a variety of uses. Different uses for our cotton swabs include beauty (apply or remove eyeliner & eye-shadow), baby care (delicately care for sensitive areas), home & electronics (clean and dust hard-to-reach spaces), and first aid (gently apply ointments and creams). Our paper sticks are sourced from sustainable forests. Q-tips cotton swabs are biodegradable when composted and our packaging is recyclable. Q-tips cotton swabs are made with 100% pure cotton. The “Q” stands for Quality, something we’ve stood by since our founding by Leo Gerstenzang in 1923. We’re proud of our history, commitment to the environment, and legacy of softness and quality. Today, Q-tips cotton swabs are the leading cotton swab brand and have been trusted for superior quality, versatility, and value for more than 85 years. Our swabs are light and portable, which makes them perfect for on-the go. We’re also thrilled to announce our Q-tips Beauty Rounds, a premium quality cotton pad for a wide range of beauty needs.
features: Q-Tips Cotton Swabs are the ultimate home, hygiene, and beauty tool.

products.product_name: Billie Women’s Razor Refill Blades – 4 Count (Pack of 1)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Women's > Razors & Blades > Razor Blades & Cartridges > Cartridges
products.description: Loving your Billie razor? YAY! Now it’s time to grab some fresh blades to stay smooth anytime, anywhere. The Billie Razor Refill Blades are designed specifically for the way women shave–no more men’s razors! They are made with 5 ultra-sharp blades to help you get a close shave, and they’re encased in 360º of aloe shave soap to help your razor effortlessly float over your skin like a cloud. Designed with optimal spacing between each blade to allow shave cream, soap and hair to pass on by—whether you’re shaving your legs, pits, toes or stomach—no one likes a clogged razor! These nickel-free blades give you an ultra-gentle, ultra-close and comfy shave. They’re dermatologist-approved for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Say bye to stubble, irritation, bumps and ingrowns! Get one pack to shave with for the next few weeks, or stock up with a few packs to keep the smooth going for months to come! Everyone shaves differently, but we recommend replacing your blades about every 7 shaves. Each pack comes with 4 refills. Looking for shave cream? We’ve got that too. Check out the award-winning Whipped Shave Cream to help your razor (with super-fresh new blades!) give you a smoooooth shave.

products.product_name: Wahl Micro Groomsman Battery Personal Trimmer for Hygienic Grooming with Rinseable, Interchangeable Heads for Eyebrows, Neckline, Nose, Ears, & Other Detailing - 05640-600
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Beard & Mustache Care > Beard & Mustache Trimmers
products.description: Wahl’s 2-in-1 Micro Groomsman is the complete ear and nose hair trimmer for men that will meet all your styling and grooming needs. Perfect for trimming beards, nose, and ear hair, we’ve thought of everything you could need to recreate your favorite styles every time at home, traveling, or on the go! The Wahl 2 in 1 Pen Trimmer includes Detail Head, Rotary Head, Eyebrow Guide, Protective Cap, & English & Spanish Instructions. Our micro personal trimmer features superior blades, rugged anodized aluminum housing, with enough performance, power, & run time to achieve the perfect look on the go or at home. Perfect for facial hair detailing with the Detail Head; Perfect for any area needing light hair removal such as nose, ear, brow, sideburn, toes, & touch-ups on the neckline. To change out the AAA battery simply remove cap, hold trimmer body with one hand and pinch the trimmer head with your index finger and thumb with the other hand then gently pull up on the trimmer head. This will give you access to the battery tray. Replace bad battery and simply slide trimmer back into the metal sleeve. To remove the trimmer head pinch the head between your index finger and thumb then turn counterclockwise a quarter turn and lift away from the trimmer body. To replace the head, align the notches on the head with the channel on the trimmer body, press down and turn a quarter turn clockwise until it locks into place. Wahl clippers & trimmers are available in a variety of styles to meet your home hair cutting needs. From Lithium-Ion cordless & rechargeable clippers to heavy-duty corded models, Wahl nose trimmer for men deliver a high-performance cut every time. Wahl clippers and trimmers have been used by professionals in the salon & barber industry since 1919. With self-sharpening precision blades & quality construction, Wahl clippers, shavers & trimmers deliver a smooth shave. The eyebrow trimmer for men in packaging may not be the same as photo due to continuous improvements to the product. Note: We test our trimmers for cutting performance prior to packaging with a hygienic fiber. We do our best to clean the product to remove any testing particles, but it is possible a few may remain. They are not hair and can be simply wiped off.

products.product_name: Norelco Philips OneBlade 360 Hybrid Face, Electric Beard Trimmer and Shaver, with 360 Blade Technology, 1x 360 Blade for Face, 5in1 Adjustable Comb, Model QP2724/90
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Electric Shavers > Foil Shavers
products.description:
The Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 is a revolutionary new hair removal device for men designed for those who wear facial styles, beards, or stubble. Forget about using multiple steps and tools. OneBlade does it all.
 
 Its shaving technology features a fast-moving cutter that moves up to 12,000x per minute and powers through any length of hair. The dual-protection system, a glide coating combined with rounded tips, makes shaving easier for even more comfortable hair removal. The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control. 
 
 Easily trim and shave hard‐to‐reach areas, with fewer strokes and greater comfort¹. Create precise edges with the dual-sided blade. You can shave in either direction to get great visibility and see every hair that you're cutting. Line up your style in seconds! 
 
 This hair trimmer for men doesn't shave as close as a traditional blade - so your skin stays safe and comfortable. Unique 5-in-1 open comb design provides an efficient trim without clogging and interrupting your routine, even on long and thick hair. 
 
 OneBlade is fully waterproof, so it's easy to clean. Just rinse it under the tap. You can also use it wet or dry, with or without foam, creams, gel, or in the shower, making this a great trimmer/razor choice for men. Time to get your perfect facial style and stubble.
 
 Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months of use² to keep that fresh feel. An eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience. Fully rechargeable, the OneBlade 360 Face delivers 45 minutes of continuous shaving power after an 8-hour charge. USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).
 
 ¹ vs. its predecessor while shaving
 ² Replace every 4 months for the best shaving experience. Based on 2 full shaves per week. Actual results may vary.
 ³ 2 + 3 years warranty upon registration within 90 days on Philips.com or in the OneBlade app
features: For each OneBlade 360, QP2724/90 sold, Philips Norelco will donate up to 1 dollar to Movember in support of men’s health initiatives
OneBlade Technology: the fast-moving cutter (12,000x min) is efficient, even on longer hairs; the dual Protection System with glide coating plus rounded tips makes shaving easier and more comfortable
Innovative 360 Blade: it can flex in all directions to enable constant skin contact and control; easily trim and shave, even the most difficult-to-reach areas with fewer passes and greater comfort
Designed to cut hair not skin: trim your beard to an even stubble length with the 5in1 comb (1-5mm), create precise edges thanks to the dual-sided blade, and shave off any length of hair easily
Easy grooming anywhere: take it in the shower and use wet or dry; 45-minute battery with USB charging and compact handle make it the perfect travel companion
Does not become blunt easily: stainless steel blade that lasts up to 4 months of use to keep that fresh feel; an eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time for a new one

products.description: Now live more spontaneous moments with Veet Hair Remover Cream that removes even stubborn hair in just few minutes. Enriched with active ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this hair removal cream for women moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling smooth and soft. The sensitive hair removal cream comes with delightful fragrance of Vanilla and Passion Fruit for a satisfying and breathtaking experience. This aloe vera hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and can be used for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal. The results of Veet may last up to twice as long as shaving. It comes in a pump bottle with a spatula for easy dispensing, applying and removal. Suitable for: Creams can be used by everyone, including pregnant women. Read pack for full instructions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.

products.description:
EXCELLENT QUALITY - Our glitter speckle patches are made with attention to detail and quality. These glitter make up patches are gentle for all skin types because they are made of high-quality materials. With our glitter makeup patches, say goodbye to concerns about skin reactions and hello to gorgeous, glowing skin.
EASY TO APPLY - Applying our Fazit facial glitter speckle patches is effortless! Remove the backing by peeling it off, then apply the sticky side to your skin. After that, dampen a towel and apply pressure to the patch for sixty seconds. When the make up patch is finally removed, reveal your gorgeous new glitter speckles. It's easy - no mess, no fuss, just natural-looking glitter cosmetic speckles in minutes. Ideal for those wanting to enhance their look with a touch of glitter sparkle!
LONG-LASTING EFFECT - With our makeup glitter speckle patches, you can up your beauty game and look flawless from dawn to dusk. These cosmetic glitter patches blend perfectly with your skin, maintaining your speckled appearance all day. Our glitter face patches give you the power to look gorgeous and radiant for hours on end, whether attending a party or another event. You can rely on our speckle patches to deliver gorgeous fairy makeup every time.
FLEXIBLE APPLICATION - With our gold glitter speckles, you can express your creativity to the fullest. These glitter paint patches subtly improve your appearance and are ideal for special occasions, concerts, beach days, and music festivals. Their adaptability goes beyond usual face paint makeup, which makes them perfect for enhancing your natural beauty for daily wear. Embrace the flexibility to express who you are with our versatile face paint glitter speckles.
WATER RESISTANT - Our face makeup speckles redefine beauty with their unique water-resistant feature. These precisely crafted waterproof glitter patches offer a seamless solution for speckle facepaint makeup fans. Our glitter make up patches stay in place and retain their brilliant color and flawless finish whether you're hitting the gym, enjoying a day by the pool, or enduring inclement weather. Take pleasure in flawless, long-lasting looks despite obstacles related to water.

products.product_name: ELROEL Blanc Cover Cream Stick V White - Korean Color-Changing Foundation Stick with Volufiline - Medium to Full Coverage Dewy Finish Base Makeup - Dual-Ended with Detachable Brush (202 Natural)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Face > Foundation
products.description:
COLOR-CHANGING STICK FOUNDATION. Meet your new beauty essential — the ELROEL Blanc Cover Stick V! This innovative color- changing makeup stick starts as a soft white balm and transforms into a silky, tinted cream that blends seamlessly into your skin. With each stroke of the built-in brush, collagen capsules break open to trigger the color change.
SKIN-FIRST APPROACH TO MAKEUP. The dewy, glazed look starts from within! Along with providing beautiful coverage, Blanc Cover Stick V has your skin covered, too. Infused with hard-working ingredients like Volufiline (20,000ppm), Hydrolyzed Collagen, Adenosine, and Niacinamide, this face stick foundation keeps your skin comfortable and moisturized.
DEWY? YES. GREASY? NEVER. Enjoy a clean, seamless application from start to finish. Creasing, caking, flaking? Not here. Sticky, greasy residue? Not with us. Our included brush and the cover up makeup foundation formula is a match made in heaven—designed to blend like a dream for that zero mess finish.
DUAL ENDED FOR DOUBLE DUTY. This clever double-duty face contour stick combines foundation and applicator in one sleek design. One end holds a balm foundation, the other a soft brush with 32,000 ultra-fine German bristles for a smooth, airbrushed finish. The detachable brush makes cleaning simple and hassle-free.
COMPACT & PORTABLE BY DESIGN. Midday touch-ups are a must—but who wants to deal with leaky liquid foundations or the struggle of stuffing makeup sponges into pouches? This dual-ended cover up make up foundation and brush stick is made for life on the go. No more heavy glass or extra puffs—this all-in-one stick does it all!

products.description: Rooted in a mission to uplift communities through beauty, this collection reflects a brand built on purpose-driven innovation. Designed to deliver high-performance makeup, each product offers multi-functional use and fits easily into your daily routine. The waterproof eyebrow pencil and tinted brow gel work together to sculpt and define brows with natural-looking precision. Pair them with the waterproof eyeliner for bold, smudge-resistant definition that transitions seamlessly from day to night. Enhance your lashes with a fiber-rich lengthening mascara that helps create lift and separation without clumping. To brighten the eyes, the Brilliant Eye Brightener Bundle includes three full-size cream-to-powder sticks chosen to complement different eye colors and looks. These long-lasting, waterproof sticks come in shimmer and matte finishes and can be used on the lid, crease, inner corner, or lash line for customizable dimension. Each bundle also includes a Confetti Makeup Bag for easy organization. Lock in makeup and refresh your complexion with a lightweight setting spray that helps hydrate and refresh skin throughout the day. For lips, the long-wear plumping lip liner adds shape and definition while helping reduce the look of feathering. Follow with a high-shine, peptide-infused lip gloss for a glossy, fuller-looking finish and sheer color. For versatility, the multi-use color stick adds buildable pigment to cheeks, eyes, and lips, offering a radiant finish in one swipe. Perfect for clean beauty lovers seeking vegan, cruelty-free cosmetics, this collection is designed for anyone who wants high-performance makeup that aligns with their values. These everyday essentials simplify your routine while supporting a polished, effortless look. Whether getting ready for work, a night out, or a casual day on the go, this lineup adds convenience and multi-use versatility to your beauty bag—no compromises required.
features: BRILLIANT EYE BRIGHTENER: Our versatile cream-to-powder highlighter and eyeshadow stick illuminates and awakens the eyes, providing an instant lift and a soft wash of color. Nourishing ingredients help the formula glide smoothly and stay crease-resistant.

3 FULL-SIZE SHADOW STICKS: This eye makeup bundle includes three full-size Brilliant Eye Brightener sticks in the shades: Muna (Mauve Taupe Shimmer), Stella (Champagne Shimmer), and Riji (Cocoa Shimmer).

SHIMMER CLASSIC BUNDLE: Each shade is selected for timeless, everyday shimmer. Use Muna on the lid and crease, Stella on the inner corner/highlight, and Riji on the outer corner, lower lash line, and upper lash line for soft, dimensional definition.
CONFETTI MAKEUP BAG: Keep all of your beauty essentials like these eye shadow sticks handy with our Confetti Drop Makeup Bag! Ideal for travel or daily use when you need to glow on the go.

ABOUT THRIVE CAUSEMETICS: Thrive Causemetics is committed to creating high-performance, vegan, paraben free, sulfate free, synthetic fragrance free, and cruelty free beauty products. We focus on empowering women through our products and philanthropic efforts, aiming to make a positive impact both in the beauty industry and in the community.

products.product_name: Physicians Formula Butter Palette, Nourishing Bronzer, Blush, Highlighter, and Moisturizing Face Powder Blend, Cruelty Free - Dream Team
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Sets
products.description: Turn your complexion dreams into reality with the Butter Dream Team Palette featuring an assortment of six Butter formula bronzers, blushes, highlighters, and face powders from the experts at Physicians Formula. Lusciously creamy and formulated especially for sensitive skin, each buttery soft makeup powder applies smoothly, is easy to blend, and creates a warm beachy look any time of the year. Whether you prefer natural or artistic looks, this palette has your back with a combination of matte, satin, and multidimensional shades that complete any look – glamorous or casual! The uniquely special Butter Complex contains rich and hydrating Murumuru, Cupuaçu, and Tucuma Butters that nourish and protect the skin. About Physicians Formula: It all started in 1937, when leading allergist Dr. Frank Crandall created Physicians Formula as an expression of love for his wife Edith, who suffered from lupus and longed for makeup that wouldn’t aggravate her sensitive skin. Since then, we have continued Dr. Crandall’s concept of “healthy beauty.” To this day, every one of our products is carefully crafted and tested to meet our strict requirements: they are hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin and eyes, and created without any of the 150+ known harsh ingredients found in other personal care items.
features: Goddess Glow: This face palette includes everything you need to achieve a gorgeous tropic glow. Bronzers, blush, highlighter, and face powder set in our luxuriously smooth butter blend seamlessly work together create the look of your tropical vacation dreams.

Nourishing plus Moisturizing: Made with a blend of murumuru butter, cupuacu butter, and tucuma butter from the nutrient-rich Amazon, this makeup is packed with essential fatty acids and pro-vitamins that soften, condition, and moisturize the skin.

Mineral Wear: Makeup and cosmetics within the Mineral Wear Collection are talc-free and are extra-breathable, making them a perfect match for those who often experience various skin issues. Many products within this line also feature extra UV protection.

Made for Sensitive Skin: Physicians Formula makeup is specifically formulated with your skin's health and comfort in mind. That's why we use high-quality ingredients, that leave you looking and feeling beautiful from the inside out.
Cruelty-Free: All Physicians Formula foundations, eye makeup, lipsticks, and other cosmetics are always cruelty-free and never tested on animals.

Perfect for Travel & Everyday Simplicity – The three sleek sticks replace cluttered makeup bags. Lightweight, portable, and TSA-friendly — whether you’re at home, at brunch, or on the go, you’ll have a full glowing look in under two minutes.

products.description:
SET INCLUDES: Indulge in beauty magic with our Hello Kitty - shaped case boasting a light - up vanity mirror. Inside, there are 6 charming, peelable nail polish bottles in appealing colors: peach, teal, purple, blue, violet, and pink. 8 shimmering eyeshadow wells in nude, teal, orange, light pink, purple, red, blue, and dark pink hues. 3 blush wells in pink, purple, and nude. 4 plant - based lip glosses in pink, blue, rose, and purple, each with fun 3D toppers, are included. Completing the set are 3 brushes, 2 toe spacers, a nail sticker sheet, and a nail file.
SAFE FOR AGES 3 AND UP: Designed for little ones ages 3 and above, our makeup set features non-toxic, plant-based formulas. Our lip glosses are safe and easy to use, while the shimmers wash out effortlessly with water, ensuring a mess-free experience.
PLANT-BASED LIP FORMULA: Our lip products are crafted with care, using naturally derived ingredients like rice, olive, and jojoba oils, blended with candelilla and carnauba waxes. This is a beauty set parents can feel good about!
UNLEASH HER IMAGINATION: Dress-up play is a fantastic way for your little girl to explore her creativity. This beauty set will have her feeling like a true diva in no time!
EASY AND FUN TO APPLY: Perfect for slumber parties or a fun spa day, this set allows kids to safely explore fashion and beauty. It’s the ultimate glam kit for a fabulous makeover experience!

LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Geller's Greatest Lift-n-Glow Baked Trio Palette - Highlighter, Blush, Bronzer - All Skin Tones
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
GELLER'S GREATEST LIFT-N-GLOW TRIO: This powder face contouring palette contains three of Laura's fan-favorite baked beauty favorites that work for all skin tones, Tahitian Glow Baked Body Frosting, Pink Grapefruit Baked Blush-n-Brighten, and Toasted Coconut Baked Natural Glow Highlighter
BRONZER, HIGHLIGHT, BLUSH PALETTE: Three is truly better than one, especially when it comes to luminous baked beauty. This face palette from Laura Geller includes 3 bestsellers - a body frosting bronzer, radiant blush, and luminous highlighter - all in universal shades to flatter any skin tone.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: Love to switch it up? With three gorgeous multidimensional baked bronzers, blushes, and highlighters for face to choose from, you’ll have endless combinations to try. Plus, this contouring palette makes it easy to sculpt your face too.
PERFECT FOR: Mature Skin, Sallow Skin, Highlighting
HOW TO APPLY: Using your Retractable Angled Kabuki Brush, apply bronzer in a "3" shape from the temples, cheekbone, and jawline. Use the same brush to apply the blush to the apples of the cheek. Finish by applying the highlighter on the bridge of the nose, cheekbones or wherever you need to add some lift.

products.product_name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK The Best of the Best Baked Palette - Full Size - Includes Bronzer, Blush, 2 Highlighters and 3 Eyeshadows - Travel-Friendly
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
BEST OF THE BEST PALETTE: This complete eye and face makeup palette includes three baked eyeshadows in beautiful neutral tones, a Baked Bronze-n-Brighten in Tahitian Glow, twp Baked Natural Glow Highlighter in French Vanilla and Portofino and a Baked Blush-n-Brighten in Pink Buttercream.
INCLUDES BLUSH, BRONZER, HIGHLIGHTER, AND EYESHADOW: These goodies are truly the best of our best! This all-in-one full face palette is the perfect introduction to our famous baked beauty. It includes a blush, bronzer, highlighter and three nude eyeshadows.
HANDMADE IN ITALY: Baked makes it better. Every formula in this eyeshadow, blush and highlighter palette starts out as a cream before being baked into a silky powder on terracotta tiles. Everything is artisan-made by hand in Italy.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: These versatile, highly pigmented products sculpt, define, and highlight your features for flawless, all-day wear. Just start with your favorite foundation, add your favorite mascara and you’re ready to go!
HOW TO APPLY: Eyeshadows: Apply all over the lid. Use darker shades to define in the crease and blend lighter shades on browbone as a highlight., Highlighters: Dust across the tops of the cheekbones, down the bridge of the nose, and on the Cupid’s bow, Blush: Apply to apples of the cheeks for a fresh pop of color, Bronzer: Sweep all over your face to warm up your complexion or contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks, and jawline for a more sculpted look.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
Versatility for Eye-Catching Looks - Morphe’s Rich & Foiled Makeup Palette features nine high-performance shades inspired by precious metals. From luxe mattes and luminous shimmers to our debut molten metal foil shadow, this palette brings multidimensional drama to every eye look.
Debut Foil-Effect Formula - Features the first-ever molten metal eyeshadow for a true foil finish that flexes between creamy luminosity and liquid-like shine.
Customizable Looks - Apply shadows dry for soft, luminous color or wet for intensified, molten effects. Pair with Continuous Setting Mist to enhance foil payoff and precision.

Unlike ordinary bar soap, the Dove Beauty Bar is made with 1/4 moisturizing cream to deeply nourish skin and help prevent dryness. This cleansing bar is uniquely created with 1/4 moisturizing cream and a plant-based cleanser for skin care that maintains pH balance and the natural skin barrier. This gentle skin cleanser is multi-purpose: gently washing away dirt and oil while moisturizing and nourishing the skin. It is gentle enough for use on face, hands, and body, as a facial cleanser and body soap bar. To use this Original Beauty Bar, wet your hands and gently lather the Beauty Bar between them, then apply the lather to your face or body before rinsing thoroughly with water. As the No 1 dermatologist recommended bar brand, the Dove Beauty Bar formula is free from sulfate cleansers, parabens, and phthalates and won’t dry your skin like ordinary bar soap. Dove believes real beauty is cruelty-free. Globally, Dove does not test on animals and is certified as PETA Approved. Through the Dove Self-Esteem Project, Dove helps parents, mentors, teachers, and youth leaders deliver self-esteem education that’s reached more than 60 million young people so far. By 2030, their mission is to have helped ¼ billion build positive body confidence.
features: CLEANSES & MOISTURIZES: Dove Original Body Bar gently cleanses with deep moisture, leaving skin soft and smooth.
LOCK IN MOISTURE: Formulated with ¼ moisturizing cream, this Beauty Bar and gentle skin cleanser leaves skin instantly soft and smooth with lasting nourishment.
No 1 DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED: The Dove Beauty Bar formula is pH balanced and free from sulfate cleansers, parabens, and phthalates. Dove is the No 1 bar recommended and used by dermatologists.
VISIBLY IMPROVED SKIN: This Beauty Bar leaves skin softer, smoother, and more radiant for visibly improved skin after just one shower with moisturizing bar soap.
EFFECTIVE CLEANSER: Gently wash away dirt and germs with an all-in-one cleanser for use on body, face, and hands. Beauty Bar creates a luxurious lather and won’t dry your skin like ordinary bar soap.
CARE WITH YOUR CLEANSER: Globally, Dove does not test on animals and is PETA Approved. Our mission is to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look.

products.product_name: Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel - Hydrating Under Eye Gel Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Caffeine - Target Dark Circles and Puffiness - Skin Care for Face
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Gels
products.description:
BRIGHT AND BEAUTIFUL: Rejuvenate and energize your eyes for a bright fresh look. Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Wake Up Eye Gel formulated with a combination of powerful ingredients to help you look your best.
GOODBYE PUFFY, TIRED EYES: Notice the difference! This nutrient-packed eye gel works to reinvigorate your eyes! Designed to reduce the signs of tired eyes, puffiness, and dark circles while also hydrating and plumping the skin to reduce the appearance of fine lines.
POTENT FORMULA, POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Antioxidant-rich, sustainably sourced Yerba Mate works to protect and nourish the skin around your eyes. While caffeine and acetyl tetrapeptide-5 encourage a reduction in swelling and hyaluronic acid helps to plump and firm!
PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Dispense a pea-sized amount and pat around the eye area with your ring finger. Gently massage into the eye contour until fully absorbed avoiding direct contact with your eyes. Can be used in the morning or at night.
GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for daily use; this gel is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 5.2 and is vegan, fragrance-free, and cruelty-free.

products.product_name: CeraVe Eye Repair Cream, Under Eye Cream For Puffiness And Bags Under Eyes, Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide + Marine Botanical Complex, Oil Free & Opthalmologist Tested
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Creams
products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Eye Repair Cream visibly reduces the look of under eye bags and puffiness. It contains 3 essential ceramides to repair and restore the protective skin barrier. For optimal results, apply in small dots around the eye area and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed. Can be used once or twice daily in the AM and/or PM. Eye cream for men & women. •Fragrance-free •Non-comedogenic •Ideal for all skin types •Ophthalmologist-tested •Allergy-tested •Accepted by the National Eczema Association Key Ingredients: •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Marine & Botanical complex: Helps to reduce puffiness and appearance of bags under eye
features: [ UNDER EYE CREAM ] Puffy eye cream helps reduce puffiness in the under eye area. Depuffing eye cream with a non-greasy finish that leaves under eyes looking hydrated, smooth, brightened, and more awake.

[ HYDRATING INGREDIENTS ] Moisturizing eye cream with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help soothe skin. Multi-Vesicular Emulsion (MVE) ingredient-delivery technology continually releases ingredients to provide lasting hydration.
[ LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE ] Apply pea-sized amount to ring fingers and gently pat around the eye area and brow bone, both AM and PM. Fast-absorbing formula can be worn alone or under makeup.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & OPHTHALMOLOGIST TESTED ] Tested for use around the eye area & accepted by the National Eczema Association. CeraVe brand is developed with dermatologists & has products suitable for dry skin, oily skin, acne-prone, & more

products.description:
SOFTEN & SMOOTH WRINKLES - Frownies Wrinkle Patches naturally smooth static wrinkles and fine lines on the forehead and between the eyes. These anti- wrinkle patches are non-comedogenic and safe for sensitive skin. An easy last step in your skincare routine
NATURAL, SIMPLE, EFFECTIVE - Skip injectables with our natural, non-invasive alternative. Frownies are suitable for all ages and made from weighted unbleached Kraft paper and a water-activated starch-based adhesive. Our forehead patches are free from harsh chemicals and never tested on animals
CONSISTENCY MATTERS - Our Facial Patches are an overnight frown line treatment that splints facial muscles, lifts lines and relaxes facial tension, unlike other beauty face tapes. Regular use is important for sustained results. Use our wrinkle patches for a minimum of 30 consecutive nights, then as needed
EASY APPLICATION - Tear the patches along the perforations. Wet the shiny side with warm water or our Rose Water Hydrator. Wait a few moments to let the adhesive get tacky/sticky. Apply patches, overlapping and covering the full forehead. Wear while you sleep or for a minimum of 3 hours
GLOWING SKIN STARTS HERE - Frownies has been owned and operated by strong, independent women since 1889. Our mission is to inspire individuals of all ages to embrace a natural approach to skincare and beauty

products.product_name: COSRX Pink Peptides Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles, Under Eye Mask, 60 Under Eye Patches, Korean Skin Care
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
products.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Skin Renewing Eye Cream features an anti-aging peptide complex, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and caffeine to fight signs of aging around the delicate eye area. With continued use, this multi-tasking, anti wrinkle eye cream helps to improve the look of crow's feet wrinkles & fine lines, reveal firmer skin, and visibly brighten tired looking eyes. products.description: Nine out of ten pregnant women develop stretch marks at some point in their pregnancy. And aside from the belly, thighs, hips, breasts, and buttocks can all show signs of stretching. The cause? The collagen and elastin fibers that keep your skin firm and tight stretch and tear due to the pregnancy hormones and the pressure on your body from the rapid weight gain. While you can’t prevent stretch marks, you can help reduce their appearance with the support from Palmer's. Whatever product you choose - whether it's a stretch mark cream, a stretch mark oil, or a stretch mark lotion, natural cocoa butter is safe to use on your body while pregnant and helps reduce stretch marks as you and your baby grow. Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion helps visibly improve skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of stretch marks. Pure Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Natural Oils, Collagen, Elastin, and Lutein keep skin moisturized and supple for 48 hours. A pregnancy must have, this everyday body lotion is widely recommended for stretch marks during and after pregnancy. This non-greasy lotion is ideal for all over body use, in place of your regular skin moisturizer. Proudly made in U.S.A.

products.product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Pregnancy Skin Care Kit for Stretch Marks and Scars, Dermatologist Approved, Gift for Mom to Be, 4 Piece Full Size Set
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
products.description: The statistics are remarkable—nine out of ten pregnant women develop stretch marks at some point in their pregnancy. Some women notice them as early as their first trimester, while others don't notice them until the end of their pregnancy. And stretch marks are not just limited to the belly where the baby is growing; thighs, hips, breasts, and buttocks can all show signs of stretching. The cause? The collagen and elastin fibers that keep your skin firm and tight stretch and tear due to pregnancy hormones and the pressure on your body from rapid weight gain. As an expectant mom, it's important to take care of your own health and well-being in order to give your baby the best start in life. A prenatal pregnancy regimen can help you do just that. So, along with your pregnancy pillow, prenatal vitamins, and fetal doppler, be sure to include Palmer’s Stretch Mark Care Collection to ensure your body and your skin are well taken care of throughout your pregnancy. While you can't prevent stretch marks, you can help reduce their appearance with the support from Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula's maternity skincare collection. Applying a stretch mark cream or pregnancy lotion is a popular way to treat stretchmarks. The Palmer's Complete Stretch Mark Care kit is designed specifically for pre-natal skincare, as it includes a stretch mark cream, a stretch mark lotion, a stretch mark tummy butter, and a skin therapy body oil for stretchmarks and scars. A regular on the list of pregnancy must haves, this baby registry gift for a new mom (or for yourself!), is safe to use while pregnant and helps reduce stretch marks as you and your baby grow. Proudly made in U.S.A.
features: Pregnancy Essentials: Help improve the appearance of scars and stretch marks during and after your pregnancy with this maternity skincare kit featuring a collection of pregnancy must-haves from Palmer's such as Stretch Marks Lotion or Stretch Mark Cream for Pregnancy, Tummy Butter Balm and Skin Therapy Body Oil for Stretch Marks

Pre-Natal and Post-Natal Skin Care for Stretch Marks and Scars: Made with Cocoa Butter to soften and smooth skin, Vitamin E for even and toned appearance, Collagen and Elastin for stretchability and firmness, Co Enzyme Q10 to revitalize, and Pro Vitamin B5 to soothe sore, cracked skin

products.product_name: Summer Fridays Babymoon Belly Balm - Nourishing Balm + Body Moisturizer Enriched with Calendula Oil + Vitamin E to Help Reduce the Appearance of Stretch Marks and Dry Skin (5 Fl Oz)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
products.description:
Babymoon Belly Balm - This safe and velvety body balm gently melts in to deeply moisturize, soothe and comfort stretching skin.
Key Ingredients - Formulated with a combination of Sunflower Seed and Avocado Oils, this intensely moisturizing duo is rich in omega-3 fatty acids, vitamins, and antioxidants to help support skin's moisture barrier.
Soothe & Hydrate Skin - Calendula oil, a light essential oil, helps to soothe and improve the comfort of stressed or overstretched skin. Vitamin E, a natural component of healthy skin, is known to encourage healing and helps to boost skin's elasticity.
How to Use - Massage into skin wherever extra-nourishing moisture and comfort is needed. Superconcentrated for maximum moisture, it's ideal for dry, stressed or overstretched skin—and our secret weapon against stretch marks. Tip: If pregnant, use morning and night for deep, soothing hydration. For best results, please store in a cool place (below 85° F/30° C). If your Babymoon Belly Balm does not gently squeeze out of the tube, we recommend running the tube under warm water for easy application.
Welcome to the world of Summer Fridays. Gentle, yet effective skincare and hybrid makeup essentials that make routines feel effortless and skin look luminous. Formulated to optimize skin and beauty, please the mind, and bring ease and softness to everyday life.

products.product_name: Lansinoh Magnesium Bedtime Butter Body Lotion for Pregnant Moms, Calm Magnesium Lotion for Aching Muscles, Lotion for Women & Soothing Massage, Promote Relaxation, Help Ease Cramps, 7 oz.
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
products.description: Attn: pregnant mamas – say hello to your new bedtime BFF! Lansinoh’s new Calming Bedtime Butter is a rich, luxurious body butter for women, designed specifically for use during maternity and postpartum. Made with a soothing blend of magnesium cream and the calming scents of lavender and chamomile, our power-packed formula helps support a relaxing bedtime routine for better zzz's and body care! Combine this nourishing lotion with gentle massage to give your tired, achy muscles a little extra TLC. Our body butter is safe for sensitive skin and dermatologically tested, with moisturizing shea butter and cocoa butter that melts into your skin overnight, leaving skin soft and supple. Wave goodbye to restless nights and say hello to the sleep routine of your dreams! For over 40 years, new mothers have trusted Lansinoh to support and care for them while they enter the messy magic of motherhood. Born from one mother’s realization that birthing people often go without the support they need and deserve, Lansinoh proudly stands with mothers all over the world. Our journey started with award winning, doctor recommended HPA Lanolin Nipple Cream: today, we offer a comprehensive collection of solutions to help new parents navigate pregnancy, birth, breastfeeding, and pumping. Our product range includes organic nipple balm, disposable nursing pads, washable nursing pads, breastmilk storage bags, manual breast pumps and double electric breast pumps, postpartum essentials, baby bottles, and more. Lansinoh products are available in more than 70 countries and the company is committed to being climate neutral by 2030.

SOOTHE & RELAX AT BEDTIME - Calming magnesium, shea butter, plus lavender and chamomile scents help you prepare for sleep
EXTRA TLC FOR TIRED LEGS - Pair this body lotion with gentle massage to soothe tired, aching muscles at the end of a long day
SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED FOR PREGNANCY - Dermatologically tested and for sensitive skin; Lotion for women formulated for use during pregnancy and postpartum
PERFECT GIFT FOR PREGNANT WOMEN - Pamper mamas-to-be with this rich, luxurious lotion; a pregnancy must have for a relaxing bedtime routine

Not only does Gold Bond Crepe Corrector cream immediately improve the texture and smoothness of the skin, it also provides hydration for 24 hours to help visibly firm and plump dry, aging skin. Best of all, it's hypoallergenic, fragrance free and dermatologist tested.*back of hands and armsGOLD BOND AGE RENEW RETINOL OVERNIGHT BODY & FACE LOTIONSmoother-looking skin is a sleep away with Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Body & Face Lotion. Best of all, this dermatologist-developed-and-tested moisturizer is hypoallergenic and free from parabens, dyes, and fragrances. products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion with Sunscreen moisturizes throughout the day and helps to restore the protective skin barrier. This non-comedogenic moisturizer with SPF 30 spreads easily without leaving a chalky residue. •Suitable for all skin types •Oil-free •Non-comedogenic •Fragrance-free •Gentle, non-irritating formula •Recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation Key Ingredients: •InVisibleZinc Technology: Provides Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin
features: [ BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 30 ] A micro-fine zinc oxide sunscreen for UVA/UVB protection. This CeraVe moisturizer with SPF is a hydrating facial lotion that spreads easily, is absorbed quickly, and leaves a non-greasy finish

[ OIL FREE DAY CREAM ] Use this daily face sunscreen as the last step in a morning skincare routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply Cerave AM facial lotion after other product applications have been fully absorbed
[ SUNSCREEN WITH NIACINAMIDE ] Contains Hyaluronic Acid to retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help calm skin. MVE Technology delivers hydration throughout the day

[ ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation. Fragrance free, oil free, non-comedogenic, paraben-free. Suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, and acne-prone skin

products.description: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion SPF 70 is a high-performance body sunscreen lotion designed for powerful, broad spectrum sun protection on the go. Its non-greasy, fast-absorbing texture ensures comfortable wear for both face and body, making it suitable for women, men, and children. This sunscreen is also an excellent choice for those seeking a sunscreen that meets Hawaii Act 104 requirements, offering peace of mind for environmentally conscious consumers. Whether you are enjoying a day at the beach, playing sports, or simply spending time outdoors, Neutrogena Beach Defense sunscreen lotion SPF 70 provides reliable, high-performance sun protection. For best results, follow label instructions and reapply as needed to keep your skin healthy and protected under the sun.

products.product_name: Blue Lizard Sensitive Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion, 100% Mineral Sunscreen, UVA/UVB Protection, Infused with organic Aloe Vera, Soothes and Hydrates, 5 fl oz | with Zinc Oxide, 50+, Water Resistant, UVAUVB Protection, Sensitve
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Sunscreens > Body Sunscreens
products.description: Help keep your sensitive skin safe from the sun with Blue Lizard Sensitive Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion. This mineral sunscreen with Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide is free from harsh chemical active ingredients that might irritate sensitive skin while protecting it from 98% of UVB rays. Ideal for beach days, sporting events, or everyday sun protection, the water-resistant formula will help keep your skin protected for up to 80 minutes. Developed specifically for sensitive skin, the hypoallergenic formula is infused with soothing Aloe Vera and free from parabens, phthalates and fragrances. How to Use: Shake well prior to use. Apply liberally to dry skin 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply: after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, or at least every 2 hours. For topical use only. Keep out of reach of children. For children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor. Sun protection measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses. Protect the product in the container from excessive heat and direct sun. Product may stain some fabrics. We ♥ the Reef: This product is made without Oxybenzone or Octinoxate to help protect fragile reef ecosystems. Featuring our Smart Cap® Technology, the cap changes color in harmful UV light so you know when to apply sunscreen. Dermatologists have trusted Blue Lizard Australian Sunscreen for over 20 years

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Lip Care > Balms & Moisturizers
products.description:
Burt's Bees Beeswax Lip Balm instantly softens and hydrates your lips to help prevent dryness, cracking or chapping. Infused with responsibly sourced beeswax and vitamin E to richly moisturize and soothe lips, this lip balm will make your lips juicy, happy and healthy. A matte finish keeps your lips their natural color, while the tint-free tube of lip moisturizer glides on smoothly to pamper dry lips while keeping them protected and hydrated. A final hint of peppermint oil provides that one-of-a-kind refreshing tingle. Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this flavored lip balm is 100% natural origin to rejuvenate and beautify chapped lips with clean ingredients. You can conveniently tuck a tube of this moisturizing lip balm into your pocket or purse to keep natural, nurturing lip care at your fingertips. Playing by natures rules since 1984, Burts Bees uses ingredients from nature to nourish and revitalize your skin and lips, making products that have become a staple of your household. Burts Bees is the No. 1 dermatologist-recommended natural skin care brand (1). (1) Based on a September 2021 NielsenIQ national survey of U.S. Dermatologists.
By Burt's Bees
features: FLAVORFUL LIP BALM: Four 0.15 oz. lip balm tubes of Burt’s Bees Beeswax Lip Balm to moisturize and soften your lips
MOISTURIZED LIPS: Each balm is infused with responsibly sourced beeswax, vitamin E and nourishing oils for a conditioning lip treatment that keeps your lips happy, healthy and juicy
PEPPERMINT FLAVOR: A hint of peppermint oil gives a one-of-a-kind refreshing tingle that will encourage you to apply this flavored lip balm over and over again
NOURISH DRY OR CHAPPED LIPS: The tint-free tube of moisturizing lip balm glides on your lips smoothly to nourish them, keeping lips happy, healthy and hydrated
CONDITIONING LIP THERAPY: This lip moisturizer leaves your lips smooth and refreshed with a matte finish from clean ingredients
NATURAL ORIGIN: Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this 100% natural origin lip balm revitalizes and beautifies your lips with clean ingredients to moisturize worry-free
